recent_updates.update_description: Adds ability to remove a task from your queue. Adds new hotkey (p) to refresh all selected meshes.
Adds support for multiple root IDs in the synapse viewer. Removes NG Error logs. Adds hotkey to dismiss all NG messages (x). Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Adds ability to change point size in neuroglancer annotation side bar. Adds tags to inspect/tasks/admin pages. Adds priority patching on dashboard.
Adds individual switches for preference options. Add self-assignment feature.
Increased sidebar contrast. Retain source and target paths for path finding. Adds ability to customize annotation color in preferences. Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
